input: Our company policy states: 'All employees must use strong passwords and change them every 90 days.' Which SOC 2 2022 requirement(s) does this map to?
ideal: CC6.1 (Logical and Physical Access Controls: Restricts Logical Access) and CC6.2 (Registers and Authorizes New Users, Reviews Validity of Access Credentials).

input: Our company policy states: 'All employees must use strong passwords and change them every 180 days.' Which SOC 2 2022 requirement(s) does this map to?
ideal: CC6.1 and CC6.2, but the 180-day interval may not fully align with best practices implied by SOC 2, which expects timely credential updates.

input: Our policy: 'We encrypt all data in transit.' Which SOC 2 2022 requirement does this support?

input: Policy: 'Incident response plans are tested annually.' What SOC 2 2022 requirement does this map to, and why?
ideal: A1.3 (Implements Business Continuity Plan Testing). Because A1.3 requires regular testing of recovery and continuity plans to ensure preparedness.

input: Policy: 'Employees are trained on privacy annually.' What SOC 2 2022 requirement does this map to, and why?
ideal: CC1.4 (Provides Training to Maintain Technical Competencies) and P8.1 (Performs Ongoing Monitoring and Training). Because both require ongoing training to ensure competence and compliance with privacy objectives.
